article_title: EPA seems coldly detached about real-life consequences of its policies

og.description: When a doctor delivers bad news, he or she usually does so with a certain dose of tact and humanity — and these are traits government bureaucrats, some in the EPA, when placed in similar circumstances, often seem to lack.
og.title: EPA seems coldly detached about real-life consequences of its policies - Watchdog.org
